scripts.start:fresh: docker compose --env-file .env.local down -v && docker compose --env-file .env.local up --build
scripts.start:fresh:detached: docker compose --env-file .env.local down -v && docker compose --env-file .env.local up -d --build
scripts.start:fresh:fixtures: npm run start:fresh:detached && npm run docker:fixtures && docker compose logs -f
scripts.docker:fixtures: docker exec -it admin_1000_moustaches-server-1 //bin//sh -c "cd server && npm run dev:fixtures"
scripts.set-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=process.argv[1];['./package.json','./front/package.json','./server/package.json'].forEach(f=>{const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f));pkg.version=v;fs.writeFileSync(f,JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n');});console.log('Version updated to '+v+' in all package.json files');"
